VOTABLE.DESCRIPTION: cntr ___ entry key (counter) number (unique within table) hemis ___ hemisphere (N/S) of facility from which src was observed xdate ___ observation reference date scan ___ scan number (unique within date) id ___ source ID number (unique within scan) ra (deg) ___ right ascension (J2000 decimal deg) dec (deg) ___ declination (J2000 decimal deg) glon (deg) ___ galactic longitude (decimal deg) glat (deg) ___ galactic latitude (decimal deg) x ___ unit sphere x value y ___ unit sphere y value z ___ unit sphere z value err_maj (arcsec) ___ Semi-major axis length of the one sigma position uncertainty ellipse err_min (arcsec) ___ Semi-minor axis length of the one sigma position uncertainty ellipse err_ang (deg) ___ angle of error ellipse major axis (E of N) x_scan (arcsec) ___ x (cross-scan) position (U-Scan coord.) y_scan (arcsec) ___ y (in-scan) position (U-Scan coord.) cnf_flg ___ "confusion" flags from band merging j_m (mag) ___ J band selected "default" magnitude h_m (mag) ___ H band selected "default" magnitude k_m (mag) ___ K band selected "default" magnitude j_msig (mag) ___ J band "default" mag uncertainty h_msig (mag) ___ H band "default" mag within ap.) j_skysig (DN) ___ J band std. deviation of sky pixel level h_skysig (DN) ___ H band std. deviation of sky pixel level k_skysig (DN) ___ K band std. deviation of sky pixel level j_blend ___ number of point source components fit to J band source h_blend ___ number of point source components fit to H band source k_blend ___ number of point source components fit to K band source j_peakpix (DN) ___ J band band peak pixel level above background h_peakpix (DN) ___ H band band peak pixel level above background k_peakpix (DN) ___ K band band peak pixel level above background j_m_stdap (mag) mag uncertainty h_msig_r1 (mag) ___ H band R1 mag uncertainty k_msig_r1 (mag) ___ K band R1 mag uncertainty j_prob_pers ___ J band persistence probability (0.0 <= p <= 1.0) h_prob_pers ___ H band persistence probability (0.0 <= p <= 1.0) k_prob_pers ___ K band persistence probability (0.0 <= p <= 1.0) j_prnt_id ___ J band persistence parent ID number h_prnt_id ___ H band persistence parent ID number k_prnt_id ___ K band persistence parent ID number j_mrg_flg ___ J band "merge" flags (BF status flags) h_mrg_flg ___ H band "merge" flags (BF status flags) k_mrg_flg ___ K band "merge" flags (BF status flags) j_pix_flg ___ J band "pixel" src extraction flags (BF # bad pixels in ap.) h_pix_flg ___ H band "pixel" src extraction flags (BF # bad pixels in ap.) k_pix_flg ___ K band "pixel" src extraction flags (BF # bad pixels in ap.) j_prg_flg ___ J band "purge" flags (BF flag ='fil', NDBF = 'upl') h_prg_flg ___ H band "purge" flags (BF flag ='fil', NDBF = 'upl') k_prg_flg ___ K band "purge" flags (BF flag ='fil', NDBF = 'upl') j_cal (mag) ___ J band mag calibration value for source h_cal (mag) ___ H band mag calibration value for source k_cal (mag) ___ K band mag calibration value for source dist_edge_ns (arcsec) ___ distance to nearest north or south full-coverage scan edge dist_edge_ew (arcsec) ___ distance to nearest east or west full-coverage scan edge dist_edge_flg ___ flag indicating which edges ([n|s][e|w]) are nearest to src a ___ optical source catalog identifier of closest match within 5" id_opt ___ associated optical source catalog ID ("best" match) dist_opt (arcsec) ___ distance in arcsec relative to associated optical source phi_opt (deg) ___ position angle relative to optical source (E of N) b_m_opt (mag) ___ catalog blue mag of associated optical source vr_m_opt (mag) ___ catalog visual or red mag of associated optical source nopt_mchs ___ number of optical sources matched to this 2MASS source rd_flg ___ source of JHK "default" mags (AKA "read flag") bl_flg ___ indicates # JHK components fit simultaneously to source cc_flg ___ indicates JHK artifact contamination and/or confusion cc_old ___ value of cc_flg before DB_MAPCOR processing ph_qual ___ flag indicating photometric quality of source mp_flg ___ src is positionally associated with an asteroid, comet, etc gal_contam ___ flag indicating if src is contaminated by extended source ndet ___ number of >3-sig. ap. mag measurements, # possible (jjhhkk) ext_key ___ key to extended source data DB record mp_key ___ key to minor planet prediction DB record night_key ___ key to night data record in the night data table scan_key ___ key to scan data record in the scan information table htm20 ___ HTM 20 spatial (x,y,z) index key coadd_key ___ key to coadd data record in the atlas image data table coadd ___ number of atlas image in which the source falls designation ___ source designation formed from sexigesimal coordinates use_src ___ use source flag -- source is to be used in catalog dup_src ___ duplicate source extractions flag (overlap areas) spos ___ # of scans in which src position falls inside coverage area sdet ___ # of scans in which src was detected in >=1 band prox (arcsec) ___ distance in arcsec to nearest catalog point source pxpa (deg) ___ angle (deg E of N) to nearest catalog point source pxcntr ___ cntr of nearest catalog point source jdate (jdate) ___ julian date of source measurement to +/- 30 sec dist (arcsec) ___ Distance between the target position and each source in arcsec. angle (deg) ___ Position Angle in degree.
